text: Monica Denise Arnold (born October 24, 1980), known simply as Monica, is an American R&B; singer-songwriter. Her debut album Miss Thang was released in 1995. Her second album, The Boy Is Mine, was successful internationally. She was born on October 24, 1980. Category:American R&B; singers Category:Singers from Atlanta Category:1980 births Category:Living people
title: Monica (singer)
